data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: The company often hired Miki, a freelance consultant, to provide ideas on improving their marketing campaigns. After ____ over ____ campaign ____ a new ____, she ____ that ____ create ____ integrated ____ campaign. The ____ could ____ television ____ to ____ the ____ to ____ customers, ____ also ____ their ____ media ____ to ____ younger ____. Senior management at the company agreed, and a year later, sales of the product had increased to nearly twice as much as they had projected.
data.partBlankContent: The company often hired Miki, a freelance consultant, to provide ideas on improving their marketing campaigns. After loo____ over th___ campaign f__ a new pro____, she recom______ that th__ create a_ integrated mark_____ campaign. The com____ could cre___ television comme______ to pro____ the pro____ to ol___ customers, wh___ also us___ their soc___ media acco____ to re___ younger cons_____. Senior management at the company agreed, and a year later, sales of the product had increased to nearly twice as much as they had projected.
data.answer: 该公司经常雇佣自由职业顾问Miki，为改进他们的营销活动提供建议。在看了他们为一个新项目做的宣传活动后，她建议他们做一个整合营销活动。该公司可以设立电视评论员，向老年消费者推广产品，同时利用他们的社交媒体账户吸引年轻消费者。公司的高级管理层同意了，一年后，该产品的销量增长到他们预计的近两倍。
